item.title: Linux命令 Aria2
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: aria2/aria2: aria2 is a lightweight multi-protocol & multi-source, cross platform download utility operated in command-line. It supports HTTP/HTTPS, FTP, SFTP, BitTorrent and Metalink. aria2配置示例 | Binuxの杂货铺 Aria2c 使用举例 ##多线程下载axel axel -q -n 10 -o /tmp/ http://soft.vpser.net/lnmp/lnmp0.7-full.tar.gz aria2c -c -x5 https://atlas.hashicorp.com/hashicorp/boxes/precise64/versions/1.1.0/providers/virtualbox.box -c
